About

Welcome to ZenDev Media, Based on the creative entities of ZenDevCo.com, this resource was created for Web Developers to work with Clients, and Clients to work with Web Developers with a sense of Zen.

The initial idea came from having the gear that produces high quality videos, photos, and branding materials to ultimately help the client engage with their target audiences.

The focus for us is to make an offering easy for someone who has a long time developer, and wants a fresh take on content or images to utilize for an update on their website or regular content to actively grow their social streams.

We ask you to get in touch with us, weâ€™re happy to talk about any upcoming projects that you might have or will help you find a package that will best suite your needs or upcoming marketing campaign.

Videography

Video is king, videography is the pinnacle of persuasive and engaging content, the vast majority of people are digesting millions of videos everyday.

There is no argument that Video is here to stay with the hyper sensitive short term memory culture that we all find ourselves in.

The standard amount of time we have to engage with a potential client or targeted community is about 8 seconds, not a lot of time when you think about it.

So let me ask you a questions, is there currently quality content on your website or social streams that is helping you keep people engaged with your brand or business?

Open the dialog for the endless possibilities with Video Marketing and contact us today for a quote on a project or take a look at our packages to get a better understanding on how we can help you grow your online presence.

Photography

Photography is a primary piece that even though the overall want for the creative marketing campaign is focused on engaging video content.

Photography still holds a very special place, its perfect for building out unique design structure within your website and providing quality images, to introduce yourself, your staff, or perhaps your amazing community.

As the old saying goes a picture is worth a thousand words, well the same holds true today, we provide packages that provide you a folder of processed, edited images that will help you keep a consistent social thread and help highlight the people and the stories that help show you off.

Branding

Branding is the graphic side, from the look of your logo, to the colors we incorporate to a website, this sets the tone for the brand moving forward.

A very important step that dictates much more than the average folks initially think about.

Are you planning on doing merchandise? are you planning on doing event spaces where you would need banners and infographics?

We are here to help not only get you a killer logo after working directly with you to brainstorm the best options to find the best fit, but help you strategize for the growth to come.

Packages

The Agent: $250 monthly packages includes - edited folder of 25 high resolution images (includes aerial images of property)

The Starter: $300 monthly packages includes - 1 video under 1 minute | edited folder of 25 high resolution images

The Marketer: $600 monthly packages includes - 4 videos under 1 minute | edited folder of 50 high resolution images

The Social Expert: $900 monthly package includes - 4 videos under 1 minute | 1 video under 5 minutes | edited folder of 50 high resolution images

The Vlogger: $1500 monthly packages includes - 4 videos under 1 minute | 4 videos under 5 minutes | edited folder of 50 high resolution images

The Social Channel: $3000 monthly packages includes - 4 videos under 1 minute | 8 videos under 5 minutes | edited folder of 50 high resolution images

Packages can be completed in 1 to 2 day scheduled shoots with a 72 hour turn around on footage and edited photos.
